name: Adventure Rage
description:
New style platformer "Super Meat Boy" , you play as a young girl archaeologist that explores the mysterious Maya civilization.
You will need not only the skills of the archaeologist, but lightning-fast reflexes,patience and nerves of steel.
Girl, and even an archaeologist, what could be cooler? Stylish, beautiful, kind, but vulnerable.
Be additional accurate in their jumps and all movements, one slightest mistake will produce to defeat.
